title: This is a horrendous movie
review:
This movie is like a film school project the lead roles parents have paid for.

All the 10 reviews only have reviewed this horror.

Please only watch with friends, so you can make fun of this trope.

title: I'd pass
review: I watched this while quarantined due to coronavirus, I was already bored and didn't have high hopes but I expected something. Definitely a very low budget film, poorly written film. The lead actress is terrible, she speaks with such a slow-emotionless tone it completely takes away from the movie. Her character also narrates everything with got very old, very fast. The lead actor has potential. Not a must see or frankly even a bored see.

title: Love story that just lacked energy!!
review: I think all the cast was great except for lead female!! She spoke like she was on downers. It was a cute love story that had a good ending. But seemed like a "B" movie without the energy of the lead actress!!
